page.title: 04FOOTBALL
page.content: AT SCHOOL I PLAY FOOTBALL WITH MY FRIENDS. AT HOME I PLAY FOOTBALL WITH MY BROTHERS OUTSIDE IN THE GARDEN. FOOTBALL IS A GAME WERE TWO TEAMS PLAY AGAINST EACH OTHER. THE TEAM THAT GETS THE MOST GOALS WINS AND BOTH TEAMS GET A PRIZE. BUT THE WINNERS GET A GOLD OR SILVER CUP THAT MEANS THE PEOPLE WHO GET THE CUP ARE THE WINNERS. THE PLAYERS PLAY WITH A FOOTBALL AND THEY HAVE TO SCORE PAST THE GOALIE AND IF YOU DO YOU CALL IT A GOAL. THE GOAL POSTS ARE WHAT YOU USE SO THE PEOPLE CAN SCORE. THE PLAYERS WEAR FOOTBALL BOOTS FOR PLAYING FOOTBALL. THE GOALKEEPERS WEAR GLOVES TO PROTECT THERE HANDS FROM GETTING HURT. ALL THE TEAMS HAVE NUMBERS ON THERE TEESHIRTS AND THEY HAVE COLOURS SO THAT THEY KNOW WHAT TEAM THEY ARE ON. THE REFEREE HAS TO DECIDE IF IT IS A PENALTY. BY GARRY HESLOP.
